attributes.action: ban the brutal killing of bears to create the bear skin hats of HRH the Queen's guards and to use the synthetic alternative instead.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to ban the slaughter of innocent bears to create the bear skin hats of Her Majesty's guards. I offer the suggestion of using the synthetic alternative to this brutal "tradition" which is a disgrace to the country.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps several in existence already -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/slaughter/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
